channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2023090989
item.description:
Report X-2023090989

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-20T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: ELMSFORD
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet and punctured in damaged hazmat cage in terminal upon arrival. All 4 - 1 gallon bottles of Diversey Sealed Air Suma Nova L6 Mechanical Dish Detergent were removed and inspected. All caps were tightened and secured with 2 of the 4 bottles having a slightly less amount of solution than the other two. Liquid spillage and small punctures to the box can be seen on one side of the box. DescribePack: Internal and External partition corroded by inner liquid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was stood upright and brought over to Damage Hazmat cage for immediate inspection.

item.title: Report X-2023090897
item.description:
Report X-2023090897

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-18T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-13
  • City: LONG ISLAND CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While the package unloaded package handler found it was leaking and inform the QA staff, and kitty litter were used to cover the leakage and package was put in the plastic bag and send it to hazmat damage area. DescribePack: The plastic bottle cap was loose and result in internal leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: kitty litter were used to cover the leakage and package was put in the plastic bag and send it to hazmat damage area.

item.title: Report I-2023090149
item.description:
Report I-2023090149

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-16T18:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-16
  • City: Long Island City
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 09/16/2023 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL Express LIC facility, located at 12-12 33rd Avenue, Long Island City, NY 11106. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN1266, Perfumery products, Class 3 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Bottle s Material of Construction: Glass Package Capacity: 15 mi Amount in Package: 15 mi Number in Shipment 1 Number Failed: 1
